card.note: One thing I love most about John is his generous heart. He's always ready to lend a hand, even if it's just cooking a meal for a friend who's life is just too crazed. His generous example help's me be a better person. Love you, Darlin'!
card.author: Your Lovin' Wife, Lies

card.note: JR has great knowledge of 80's music lyrics and a wonderful appreciation of Seinfeld humor. He can always find just the right jewel of a line to cheer me up, even on the worst of days. Humor is his gift.
card.author: Sue Topple

card.note: JR and I go way back. I have always enjoyed our friendship- he is a great person, passionate about life (family and career) and cares about others. Happy Birthday, JR!
card.author: Michele Hubbard

card.note: John, You always kept a positive attitude in negative times ... enjoyed working with you. Happy birthday.
card.author: Margie Hoffmann

card.note: Sharing his objective reality followed by his sarcasm. And the Katie stories!
card.author: Darcy Mason (Buelow)

card.note: One thing I like most about John Ross is his humility. Who else calls a busy pastor on Easter weekend and says: "What can I do for you or the church?" JR does ... every year! God bless him, Liesl, and Kady!!!
card.author: Much love -- the Oelhafens

card.note: You are such a fun "Beer Buddy" when we all get together with Kitt and Dieter. Also a SUPER DAD!!
card.author: Love, Malou

card.note: You can make MEAN dressing!!! Your very hospitable & your love for your family is very apparent! Happy birthday!!
card.author: Housley family

card.note: So, only one thing!?! /R/RThat would be that on top of his being the son-in-law of a mother's dream, a poetic chef, the family chronicler, a wit, an athlete; he is above all a God- inspired husband and father, a gift to his church, his community, and to us, his family.
card.author: Kitt and Dieter

card.note: With all the new interest in energy drinks, we would like to patent and bottle "JR Ross Energy Drink" (that would be a real monster one). Happy Birthday, always good to see you when you return home.
card.author: Frank and Chris Cahill

card.note: JR...our families don't spend enough time together. It was great seeing you last year. You have an amazing family. You are one of the kindest, sweetest people I know. Happy Birthday!??
card.author: Michelle Klein ?

card.note: What a great Dad and husband you are!
card.author: Kathy Rink

card.note: Some of the things we love about John are his smile, kindness, and genuineness. He never fails to greet you with a chipper "Howdy neighbor!" You can't help but laugh and love him. Happy Birthday to our wonderful, generous friend and best dad!
card.author: The Seidenglanz Family

card.note: Love is when your son teaches you how to cook bacon. Quote JR -"the correct way to cook bacon is you gotta cook it slow" - end quote.
card.author: Love, Mom and Dad

card.note: You're an award winning chef!
card.author: The Dork

card.note: One thing I love about you is that even after almost 26 years together, you can still surprise me...and it's almost always pleasantly!!
card.author: Liesl

card.note: JR - you've been a great friend for how many years now? Wow time flies. Thank you for giving me both of my nicknames - cricket and unfortunately Boo Hoo. I'll be happy to get you a grape soda next time I see you - hopefully soon! Happy birthday old man!
card.author: Christy Quick

card.note: Happy Birthday JR!
card.author: Cus de la Merced

card.note: One thing I like most about my Daddy is playing with my dad.
card.author: kady

card.note: I love my dad when he makes my bed
card.author: kady

card.note: I love my dad when he gives me horsey back rides
card.author: kady

card.note: I love my Daddy because he drives me around the block and I get to sit in the front seat!
card.author: kady

card.note: I love John because he's such a great dad: cuddles, kisses,gives her money for junk from the gumball machines, builds "Camp Snoopy" when she's sick and prays to be a better Dad
card.author: Liesl

card.note: JR - Ewe are a fantastic person and proud tewe call ewe my brother. I learned a lot from ewe and wish ewe another 50 years. Take care, happy birthday and let me know when ewe and ewer family are in Detroit - YITBOS
card.author: Jeff McKenzie
